results.title: Enhanced osteogenic healing process of rat tooth sockets using a novel simvastatin-loaded injectable microsphere-hydrogel system.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The injectable @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-loaded microsphere hydrogel promoted new bone formation in the @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014076 @@@tooth extraction@@@ socket after 5 weeks, and has a promising potential for bone repair and regeneration.

results.title: The Effect of Simvastatin on mRNA Expression of Transforming Growth Factor-beta1, Bone Morphogenetic Protein-2 and Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor in Tooth Extraction Socket
results.text_hl: The findings indicate that local administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can influence alveolar bone remodeling by regulating the expression of a school of growth factors which are crucial to osteogenesis in the @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014076 @@@tooth extraction@@@ socket.
